meanings.definition: A breed of large Russian wolfhound dogs with a silky coat and a long, narrow head.
meanings.sent1: The borzois gracefully ran across the field, their silky coats shining in the sun.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of borzois at the dog show, and they were truly magnificent creatures.
meanings.sent3: The borzois decided to have a fashion show, each showing off their silky coats in style.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as sleek and shiny as a borzois' coat, flowing down her back.
meanings.sent5: The borzois' long, narrow heads made them look like elegant aristocrats of the dog world.
